## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Ww][Ii][Nn]32/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Visual Studio cache/options directory
.vs/

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
**/packages/*
!**/packages/build/

# Docker
**/obj/Docker/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local
**/.env

# Secrets
**/appsettings.Development.json
**/appsettings.*.json
!**/appsettings.json
secrets.json

# AWS
*.pem
*.ppk

# Database
*.db
*.db-shm
*.db-wal

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDEs
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/
